pkgmetadata.longdescription: Z3 is a theorem prover from Microsoft Research with support for bitvectors, booleans, arrays, floating point numbers, strings, and other data types.For documentation, please read http://z3prover.github.io/api/html/z3.htmlIn the event of technical difficulties related to configuration, compilation, or installation, please submit issues to https://github.com/z3prover/z3.git
